channel.title: Rscd v25 help
channel.description:
my first question is :When i set stats to 99, and relog, it makes me combat level 1, and my stats are 99/1 or some random number/1
my second question is: when i edit something in commandhandler or anywhere else do i gotta recompile the whole server?

item.title: Rscd v25 help
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“afr0samurai, post:3, topic:270872”][quote author=snoopy89 link=topic=357479.msg2731404#msg2731404 date=1238744614]
yes you pretty much have to compile the whole.
[/quote]

k thx any clue on the first question?[/quote]

Its made for only that. if you want it else you will have to goto the DB and and give your self the right amount or as yong min says give you self exp.

Read full topic

item.title: Rscd v25 help
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Try setting it to give the amount of exp for 99 too
